title: Sri Lanka seeking US$ 4Bn from IMF: Ali Sabry
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s new Finance Minister, Ali Sabry states that the country plans to start talks with the IMF on April 18 to secure as much as $4 billion in aid for the economy.
He also signaled optimism in getting financial support from China and India.
We should overcome this challenge with unity and better understanding: President
